Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerStub1, PlayerStub2
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class represent the player. A player can perform each action that a real player can perform in the physical game.

    • drawDevelopmentCard

      public void drawDevelopmentCard​(Color color, int level, java.util.ArrayList<Discount> discounts) throws NoCardException, InvalidDiscountException, NotEnoughResourcesException, WrongLevelException
      Fetch DevelopmentCardSet from Game, peek the required card, check if the player owns the requirements needed to buy the card
      Parameters:
      color -
      level -
      discounts - null if the player doesn't want to use any discount
      Throws:
      NoCardException - if the set of cards required is empty
      NotEnoughResourcesException - if the resources owned by player do not satisfy the ones required to buy the card
      WrongLevelException - if the card is not placeable in any position of the deck
      InvalidDiscountException

    • payFromStrongbox

      public void payFromStrongbox​(Resource resource) throws NotEnoughResourcesException
      Pay a resource contained in the developmentCardCost map
      Parameters:
      resource - to remove from developmentCardCost
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException - if the strongbox doesn't contain the resource in the selected index

    • payFromWarehouseDepot

      public void payFromWarehouseDepot​(Resource resource) throws NotEnoughResourcesException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException - if the warehouseDepot doesn't contain the resource in the selected index

    • placeDevelopmentCard

      public void placeDevelopmentCard​(int position) throws WrongLevelException, GameEndedException
      Place Development Card in the selected deck
      Parameters:
      position - between 1 and 3
      Throws:
      WrongLevelException - if the card is not placeable at the given position
      GameEndedException

    • goToMarket

      public int goToMarket​(java.lang.String directionSelection, int position) throws OutOfBoundColumnsException, OutOfBoundRowException, InvalidDirectionSelection
      Parameters:
      directionSelection -
      position -
      Returns:
      the number of White Marbles picked
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundColumnsException - when column position is negative or column position is greater 3
      OutOfBoundRowException - when row position is negative or row position is greater than 2
      InvalidDirectionSelection

    • addInMarketStrategyStack

      public void addInMarketStrategyStack​(MarketStrategy marketStrategy) throws InvalidStrategyException
      Add a strategy to the stack before converting marbles in the market
      Parameters:
      marketStrategy - the strategy to add
      Throws:
      InvalidStrategyException - if the player doesn't own the strategy or there are no more strategies to use.
